name: Cyber Chess
overview:
A chess playing game written by William Tunstall-Pedoe. It can be played in either 2D or 3D views.

The game can be played against the computer, at varying levels, or between two players.

You can save the current board setup as a native Cyber Chess file for returning to later; and additionally you can save the board layout as a Draw file. Very useful should you want to print, say, competition results.
